title: Developer brings Wear OS to the ancient Samsung Gear S3
content:
The skill of aftermarket developers in the Android modding scene is often incredibly impressive, especially when it comes to getting hardware to do things it shouldn’t. This time, one modder managed to get Google’s Wear OS booted on the Samsung Gear S3 — a Tizen-based smartwatch released back in 2016! Despite effectively being obsolete at

The post Developer brings Wear OS to the ancient Samsung Gear S3 appeared first on XDA.
description: A developer is working on turning the Samsung Gear S3 into a Wear OS watch, and it may actually be possible to do just that.
